resources.string:
Santractor is an enhanced version of the app Saavn Extractor.

The name Santractor is not a typo\, it is derived from Saavn\+Extractor

App is developed and maintained solely by Nick aka black-dragon74.

App's source code is available on the GitHub. Select Source from drawer to see app's source code.

App is based solely on the support libraries provided by Google. No external libraries have been used.

You are free to download the source and build it yourself\, credits should be given to original author\(me\)

You can see commits on GitHub for changelogs.
"

- Make sure you have Installed Saavn App

- You need to have Saavn pro subscription

- You must login with your credentials in Saavn app.

- Download the song you want to save.

- Play that song after downloading is complete.

- Open this App.

- Choose Extract from Navigation Drawer.

- Enter the song's name.

- Click Save\!

- Changed background color to white.

- Show changelog with option to disable it.
